message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $15,000. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit too expensive. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth significantly more to me. I could consider letting it go for $13,500.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $13,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
